name: @notcc/logic
description: Game logic for NotCC, a Chip's Challenge 2Â® emulator

scripts.build:proto: pbjs -t static-module --force-number -w es6 src/nonbind/nccs.proto -o src/nonbind/nccs.pb.js && pbts -o src/nonbind/nccs.pb.d.ts src/nonbind/nccs.pb.js && pnpm make-proto-hacks
scripts.make-proto-hacks: sed -i '/import Long = require("long");/d' ./src/nonbind/nccs.pb.d.ts && sed -i 's:import\ \*\ as\ \$protobuf\ from\ \"protobufjs/minimal\"\;:import\ \$protobuf\ from\ \"protobufjs/minimal.js\"\;:' ./src/nonbind/nccs.pb.js
scripts.build: pnpm build:proto && pnpm build:src && cp ./src/nonbind/nccs.pb.js ./src/nonbind/nccs.pb.d.ts ./dist/nonbind && cp ../libnotcc/build/libnotcc.so ./dist/libnotcc.wasm

author: G lander
